definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: You can hire a bicycle from the bus station and ride around the city very safely.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在公交站租一輛自行車環遊桂林，非常安全。

sentences.english: The dog checks out the times, and then sits on one of the seats provided.
sentences.chinese: 狗狗確認了時刻表後，乖乖坐在公交站的椅子上等車。

sentences.english: Traffic congestion often occurs at the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 公交站點是交通擁擠的常發地點。

sentences.english: Watch for children who may be waiting or playing near a bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 公交站點須注意，可能會有等待或在附近玩耍的兒童。
公交站點20米，公交車密集。

sentences.english: A car bomb exploded at a crowded bus station.
sentences.chinese: 一個汽車炸彈在公交站爆炸。

sentences.english: Sara goes to the bus stop where Tuxhorn's maid is waiting.
sentences.chinese: 莎拉在塔克斯宏家女傭等車的公交站出現了。

sentences.english: She too has no symptoms other than once forgetting the word for “bus station.
sentences.chinese: 除了有一次忘了“公交站”一詞，她也沒有任何病症。

sentences.english: Where is the nearest stop for Bus No 713?
sentences.chinese: 最近的有公汽713的公交站在哪？

sentences.english: I met him at the bus station.
sentences.chinese: 我在一個公交站旁遇見了他。

sentences.english: In a bus stop, road traffic flow is often delayed by bus.
sentences.chinese: 公交站點的運行往往影響道路交通流暢通與否。

sentences.english: There is a bus stop just across the road.
sentences.chinese: 在馬路對面就有一個公交站。

sentences.english: The green vines are crawling the bus stop in Cornwall, England.
sentences.chinese: 爬滿綠色藤蔓的公交站，位於英格蘭康沃爾。

definition: bus information board/street sign for a bus stop/bus stop
public transportation/mass transit/abbr. for 公共交通[gong1 gong4 jiao1 tong1]
terminus/final stop on rail or bus line
to get off or out of (a bus, train, car etc)
bus or tram stop/intermediate stop (on route of ship, plane etc)/port of call/stopover
